participant_1.background:
I like spending time with my sister but I'm not always the best at keeping up with her.
My first purchase was a new teaching outfit to inspire my students to love their bodies as much as I love mine.
I enjoy learning about my grandchildren's favorite things.
I secretly watch baseball games on my phone while I water my sunflowers every morning.
i have glasses.

participant_2.background:
I am not sure what my ethnicity is, but I do know that I love jello.
i have two roommates.
my nickname is bubblegum.
I am not close with my family, but I love my dog Bob.
i make pottery.

content.text: Hi!  I'm a teacher and I love my sunflowers.  What do you like to do?
I like to make pottery and love jello.  What is your ethnicity?
I'm not sure but I think I'm mostly French and German.  It's a mystery.  What are your favorite things about your dog?
I love my dog's personality.  He's very sweet and gentle.  What's your favorite thing about teaching?
I love inspiring my students to love their bodies.  What is your favorite thing to make in pottery?
I love making jewelry.  It's so fun to be creative.  What are your favorite things to do with your grandchildren?
I love learning about their favorite things.  It's so interesting to see the world through their eyes.  What are your favorite things to watch on TV?
I like to watch nature documentaries.  I love learning about the world around me.
